titleInfo.title: Hank Snow - Thesaurus Transcriptions - 1618 / E0-MM-0204-B dub (I'm Here To Get My Baby Out Of Jail)

mods.abstract: Dub of Hank Snow performing I'm Here To Get My Baby Out Of Jail, part of RCA's Thesaurus transcriptions. Original transcription issue 1618, matrix no. E0-MM-0204-B.
